footer.develop: Welcome to the Physics-Technical Faculty of Tomsk State University!

home.title: Welcome to the Physics-Technical Faculty!
home.subtitle: Advanced scientific research, innovative technologies, and highly qualified specialists unite at the Physics-Technical Faculty of Tomsk State University.
home.about: The Physics-Technical Faculty of TSU is one of the leading centers for training specialists in physics, mathematics, and technical sciences. The faculty conducts active research activities and prepares highly qualified specialists for various sectors of the economy.
ourtask: Training highly qualified specialists in physics and technical sciences
ourgoal: Development of research activities and innovative technologies

about.subtitle: Samarkand Youth Technopark is a center of innovative opportunities, modern knowledge, and advanced technologies for youth. Our technopark provides all conditions for startups, IT projects, education, and collaboration.
about.about_text: The technopark was established to develop innovative ideas and startups of youth, creating the best environment for acquiring modern IT infrastructure and knowledge. We have modern laboratories, mentoring programs, grants, and investment opportunities.
about.goal_1: Supporting youth’s innovative and technological projects
about.goal_3: Creating opportunities for collaboration and experience sharing
about.advantage_1_desc: The technopark features modern laboratories, spacious and comfortable offices, high-speed internet, and all necessary infrastructure.
about.advantage_2_desc: Each resident and project is supported by experienced mentors, industry experts, and a continuous advisory system.
about.advantage_3_desc: The technopark supports project development through extensive collaboration networks and grant programs.

director.name: Islom Karimov
director.description: Has 5 years of experience in technology and innovation. Participated in the development of Uzbekistan's top startups.

manager_01.name: Dilnoza Rustamova
manager_01.description: 8 years of experience in education, author of innovative methodologies.

manager_02.name: Jamshid Islomov
manager_02.description: Expert in IT infrastructure and digital ecosystem implementation.

teacher_1.name: Ubaydullo Abduhofizov
teacher_1.description: 5 years of experience in 3D modeling and design.

teacher_2.name: Dilshodbek Rakhmonov
teacher_2.description: 5 years of experience with Node.js, Python, and AWS.

teacher_3.name: Malika Ergasheva
teacher_3.description: Expert in business planning and grant acquisition for startups.

about.faq_1_q: How can I join the technopark?
about.faq_1_a: You can become a resident by submitting an application and passing the selection process.
about.faq_2_q: What opportunities are available for youth?
about.faq_2_a: Mentoring, grants, master classes, and modern offices.
about.faq_3_q: What kind of projects are implemented at the technopark?
about.faq_3_a: Innovative IT, education, and startup projects.
